entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 this morning then steady. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 this morning then steady. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
